text:
The localizer button task is used in many examples. Here I add a new function to fetch specifically this contrast.

Additional benefit: the fetch_localizer_contrasts can now specify subjects as a list, and not only the maximum number (ie: less downloads during tutorials :) )

This is ready for review, @AlexandreAbraham , @banilo

text:
ENH: add a function for localizer button task

The localizer button task is used in many examples. Here I
add a new function to fetch specifically this contrast.

Additional benefit: the fetch_localizer_contrasts can now specify
subjects as a list, and not only the maximum number (ie: less downloads
during tutorials :) )
